ai-patthana8.71:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.71:1.1_0: Examination is not the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana8.71:2.1_0: Everything the teaching that there is no cause or condition for the three conditions.
ai-patthana8.71:3.1_0: Nor should you take a teaching that there’s no cause of often reviewing this. And I give rise to one thing for the sake of another.
ai-patthana8.71:4.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
